paragraphs: Arceon AI ingests PDFs and images, extracts structured fields with OpenAI, validates them against configurable rules, and routes uncertain claims to human reviewers without breaking auditability. It is designed to replace copy-paste workflows with auditable, explainable automation for claims, reimbursements, and policy checks.

The platform blends AI extraction with a Django/DRF backbone, reviewer queues, and analytics so operations teams get speed without losing control. Every document, field change, and decision is captured with RBAC and audit logs to stay compliance-ready.

Rule packs, webhooks, and modular queues make it easy to tailor Arceon AI to different lines of business or regions while keeping a single, scalable codebase. Dashboards surface throughput, accuracy, and SLA performance so leaders can measure automation impact.
bullets: Multiple ingest options (upload, batch, email/API) with versioning and re-processing.
Confidence-scored AI extraction plus rule engine for auto-approve, reject, or send-to-review paths.
Reviewer inbox with side-by-side document viewer, edit/override actions, and complete audit trails.
Role-based access with exportable logs and reports for compliance teams.
Dashboards that track volumes, throughput, and SLA-friendly accuracy metrics.
